thread.title: You should stay here!

author: Lawdawg01Newnan
title: You should stay here!
text: My wife and I stayed a couple of days in NYC on our way to Italy, and we had a GREAT stay at this hotel. It was very convenient for us. When we arrived our room was not ready because of an airline crew that was late checking out. The desk clerk was extremely apologetic and immediately offered us a free meal in the hotel restaurant. Our room was very clean and comfortable. The staff was always helpful and friendly. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting NYC, and will definitely stay here again!
